Description: Number of occurrences of the following words denoting uncertainty (Garrard et al., 2014)
Ratio of words denoting uncertainty to the total number of words (Garrard et al., 2014)
Number of occurrences of the following formulaic expressions in the sample (Van Lancker Sidtis et al., 2015)
Ratio of formulaic expressions to the total number of words (Van Lancker Sidtis et al., 2015)
Number of occurrences of the following modal expressions in the sample: (Boschi et al., 2017, Boyé et al., 2014)
Ratio of modal words to the total number of words (Boschi et al., 2017;  Boyé et al., 2014)
Ratio of filler words to the total number of words
Number of words indicating lexical access difficulties (Garrard et al., 2014; Rentoumi et al., 2014)
Ratio of words indicating lexical access difficulties to the total number of words (Garrard et al., 2014; Rentoumi et al., 2014)
Measure of the semantic similarity of a sentence to the previous one. Higher values indicate greater similarity and less semantic distance
Emotion generated by the speech sample
Average valence score of all the words in the sample.
